group_1.textRight: Masara!
Good morning!
I’m sorry to keep you waiting...

group_1.textLeft: It’s very unusual for you to be@late to an appointment.

group_1.textRight: Yeah... On the way here, I ended@up dropping my gloves somewhere.
I've searched high and low,@but I couldn’t find them...

group_1.textLeft: Would you like me to help you look?

group_1.textRight: Oh, no!@It’s okay!
I’ll look for them again on the@way home.
And if I can’t find them,@I can just knit another pair.
*Sigh*...
Still...it’s freezing today,@and I don’t have any other gloves.
[chara:301651:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! Why?!
Really...?@[chara:301651:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301651:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301651:lipSynch_1]Can I touch them for a sec?
Masara, aren’t you a little too hot?@Maybe you have a fever...
Is this...a heating pack?

group_1.textLeft: I put it in my pocket.

group_1.textRight: Oh wow, that surprised me...
Thank you,@but it’s okay.
I don’t want you to get cold...

group_1.textLeft: Don’t worry about it.@I have an extra one.

group_1.textRight: What?!@Why would you…?
…………@[wait:1][chara:301651:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301651:lipSynch_1]Alright then... I’ll take you up on that offer.
[chara:301651:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]…It’s warm!

group_1.textLeft: Now you don’t have to wear gloves.

group_1.textRight: Well, for today, yeah...
...But I think I prefer gloves@more.
Didn’t you use them when we went@skiing?

group_1.textLeft: I rented them because we were on@a snowy mountain.
A heating pack is enough for everyday@use. Besides, I don’t have any gloves.

group_1.textRight: Huh?@I see...
...Okay, I’ve decided!
Masara,@want to go to the craft store with me?
You don’t have any gloves, do you?@I’d like to knit you some!

group_1.textLeft: You don’t have to worry about it...

group_1.textRight: It’s okay, I want to do this!
Shall we go? We need to find some@yarn that’ll suit you.
